sponsor.partnerMessage: Bowen Dental Studio is a dental office unlike anything you've experienced. Our patients receive personalized, compassionate care from one of the most highly-skilled dentists in the area. We prioritize listening to and caring for our patients to build long-term relationships with them and help them reach their dental goals. Learn more here.

posts.title: Lights, Sounds, and Seesaws
posts.content:
Haven't been on a seesaw in a while? Here's a good excuse to hop on one. Impulse, an outdoor seesaw art installation of light and sound, is doing a pop-up at the Scott Family Amazeum in Bentonville.

  • Tell me more: The installation is an interactive work comprised of 12 light and sound enabled seesaws that change when in motion.
  • Open day and night, no admission needed. You can see the seesaws from now until May 10. The exhibit was first presented in 2015 in Montreal and has since made its way to Bentonville for your enjoyment.

Want more? Check out these videos HERE.

posts.title: The Community Award Goes To...
posts.content:
Rockin' Baker, a community bakery located in Fayetteville, trains and employs individuals who are on the Autism spectrum.

  • Daymara Baker, founder of Rockin' Baker started a Chef's Challenge where local well known chefs in NWA provide the students with a few ingredients that they turn into a specialty bread.
  • Participating Chefs include Chef Simon from Blake Street House in Bentonville, Chef Chrissy from Mocking Bird Kitchen in Fayetteville, and more to come!

You can listen to the encouraging story HERE. You can learn more about Rockin' Baker by visiting their site, HERE.

posts.title: Mercy Does it Again
posts.content:
And now they're just showing off... Mercy Hospital Northwest Arkansas in Rogers receives another award they can hang on the fridge - an A grade from the Leapfrog Group.

  • Leapfrog Group: a nonprofit watchdog (or better yet, watchfrog) organization that serves as a voice for health care consumers and purchasers using their influence to positively change healthcare.
  • The grade considers a combination of metrics in its ranking system, including the hospital's error prevention acumen, injuries, accidents, and infections. The grade runs from A to F. Just like in school, you don't want to end up in a F category.

You can find the full list of hospital ratings HERE.

posts.title: Your Weekend Roundup
posts.content:
Happy Friday! You know the drill - here is your Weekend Roundup with events and happenings in NWA that we'd recommend checking out...

  • Shaw Family Park: The grand opening and ribbon cutting for this new park is tomorrow morning. There will be coffee, food trucks, snow cones, and plenty of fun for the kids. Learn more here.
  • U-Pick Season: Find out where you can handpick berries this weekend in NWA here.
  • WOZ Flagship Ride: Join Women of OZ on their monthly Flagship Ride this Saturday. You can find more info here.
  • Osage Park: Soft opening of Osage Park in Bentonville is Saturday. We HIGHLY recommend stopping by this amazing spot.
  • Tontitown Farmers Market: Saturday marks the beginning of the 5th year for Tontitown's market.
  • S2S: To help kick off May Bike Month, the multi-city Square 2 Square ride is this Saturday.

Let us know what you're doing this weekend by sending us a note on IG, here. See ya out there!

pick.title: NWA Daily Picks
pick.content:
• That's a dam failure: The infamous Bella Vista Lake dam gave way Wednesday night during the floods. You can see pictures here.
  • May is Bike Month: Celebrate Bike Month the right way by winning cool prizes for riding your bike - prizes available for all styles, levels, and ages. Register here.*
  • Is this goodbye?: University of Arkansas committee recommends removing J. William Fulbright statue and name.
  • Iterations: Fayetteville Transportations Committee recommends another safety design plan for Rolling Hills road in Fayetteville.
  • Collaboration talk: We want to feature your local business in our newsletter. Head over to our website to check out our advertising packages.

*sponsored content
